comments:
Connect to build.eclipse.org.
Select a folder, which is 2 levels below My Home, and has subfolders.
Go Into that folder.
Press the "Up to" button to move the shown view up.

First, a single node "pending" is shown, then the contents of the parent directory is shown but RSE also shows an error dialog: "An error has occurred. See the error log for details". The PDE Errorlog shows:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Tree cannot be cast to org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Item

TM 2.0RC1 Testing
installation : eclipse-platform-3.3M6 (I20070323-1616), cdt-4.0M5, emf-2.3M5
RSE install  : download RSE 2.0RC1 runtime-all + terminal

Created an attachment (id=69741)
patch so that a Tree isn't casted to an Item
This wont' show up anymore since we don't allow going into folders anymore. Nevertheless, I've added a patch to avoid that class cast exception.
*** Bug 189266 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I've committed the fix for the cast exception.
Patch is good. There is really no need for casting to an Item here.

traces.message: org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Tree cannot be cast to org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Item
